we're crafting something pretty and useful in more ways than one. its the viral rose bouquet blanket! if you're a fan roses, blankets or a beginner searching for an easy pattern, this tutorial is perfect for you. 

don't know any fancy stitches? no problem! this is the easiest rose bouquet blanket on youtube. no fancy stitches, mainly just double crochet. join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a rose bouquet blanket from start to finish.

with our easy-to-follow instructions, you'll have your own rose bouquet blanket to show off to your friends in no time! whether you're a seasoned crocheter or just starting out, you'll find this rose bouquet blanket tutorial both enjoyable and rewarding. 

you will need :
* yarn - at least 3 skeins in the main blanket color (this depends on your choice of yarn and how big you want to make the blanket)
* yarn - at least 1 skein of green for the leaves and 2 skeins for roses (again this depends on size of blanket and type of yarn)
* crochet hook 
* yarn needle
* at least 12 stitch markers 

if you want your blanket to be the same size as mine, use any yarn that can fit nicely on a 3mm or 4mm hook
